00012 function smarty_core_get_microtime($params, &$smarty)
00013 {
00014     $mtime = microtime();
00015     $mtime = explode(" ", $mtime);
00016     $mtime = (double)($mtime[1]) + (double)($mtime[0]);
00017     return ($mtime);
00018 }
